name: Zombie Survival Mission
description:
Congratulations! The hit new FREE indie game is just one click away. What's your Zombie Score?! Release your inner rage against the zombie onslaught and take the last stand! Survive the zombie apocalypse so we can rebuild humanity!


Zombie Survival Mission is a 2D side scroller shooting game with an endless zombie onslaught. It comes with one playable character to start in this special mission, however you can use coins to unlock 3 additional character types (Flamethrower, Minigunner, Spec Ops). You can also unlock additional levels with coins. Get your arsenal ready and become a zombie killer!


You can obtain coins as item drops from zombies, or you can purchase them as In App Purchases. Zombies also drop ammo, health, and power-ups. The game utilizes a "hearts" system for health. You can purchase additional hearts using coins to increase your maximum health. Ammo and weapon upgrades are also available. You don't have to be a wiz kid to upgrade your arsenal in this ultimate zombie survival game.


* FREE Zombie Killer Game!
* LIMITED TIME OFFER - Start with 500 Free Currency Coins! 
* Multiple zombie types!
* Share your Zombie Score with friends!
* Upgrade your arsenal & ammo!
* Tons of updates on the way!
* Become a zombie survivor in this indie game!
* Beware the boomer!
* Jet Pack! (Coming Soon)
* ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE - it's a zombie outbreak!
* Maximum weapon upgrades to save mankind

Zombie Survival Mission is a free zombie game that will test your strategic senses as you fight to survive the zombie onslaught, no zombie survival handbook required. Play as a Spec Ops soldier in this free indie game to save mankind! This new indie game packs a zombie survival outbreak!


Playable Characters -

Foot Soldier
Weapon: 3-Round Burst

Minigunner
Weapon: Fully automatic machinegun

Flamethrower
Weapon: Flamethrower

Spec Ops
Weapons: Submachinegun + Grenades


If we get 25,000 downloads, we will add multiplayer support to our side scroller! So be sure to tell your friends about this free zombie game, the ultimate zombie apocalypse!

As the wolves smell your flesh.

Are you prepared?
